name: Keeper of the Valley (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
Once per Duel, you can discard 1 card to add 1 Spell/Trap that mentions "Necrovalley" from your GY to your hand. Apply the following Skill:
● Your GY is unaffected by "Necrovalley".
